Articles.Content:
Sent him on a mission to Duna in search of science, only to find him orbiting the sun with no fuel left.

RIP

Was a true inspiring and creative person while he lived, he will be remembered.
You can still send a rescue mission.
Nooo poor Jeb!!! He's stuck on the munn in my career currently.

Yes. Ursa shuttle got too ambitious in a turn and got into a flatspin, taking Jeb and Bill with her. Man that thing is efficient at picking a maneuver and sticking to it. Patemone is the real star though, so it doesn't matter. You could say Patemone devised this "accident" to get ahead.

Tried landing on the mun, came in too low with not enough thrust.

Smacked into the bottom of the farside crater.

Died within 0.001 seconds of impact.

My other career mode Jeb got on a plane, before he knew how to fly one.

after trying to correct a yaw problem the tip of the wing on his left side crumpled into the ground and soon after, he flipped over.
